Enjoy long lasting smoothness with Philips Satinelle Essential epilator. Gently removes hairs at the root, as short as 0.5mm. Hairs grow back thinner and more slowly to enjoy up to 4 weeks hair-free skin.

The rounded shape fits perfectly in your hand for comfortable hair removal.

item.g:title: Huggies Wonder Pants Large 48S
item.description:
When it comes to baby diapers, the most important aspect is choosing the right ones for your child. This is why the New Huggies Wonder-Pants is designed in such a manner to keep your baby dry & comfortable. The diaper pant has super stretchy elastic which adapts to the baby’s waist size to give a gentle and comfortable fit. The absorption of the pant lasts up to 12 hours which helps your baby sleep uninterruptedly.

Huggies Wonder Pants is the perfect choice to give your baby unbeatable comfort and dryness. This particular baby diaper pack consists of 48 Large sized diapers. Huggies Wonder-Pants are also available in different sizes from Small to XXL to suit your baby accordingly.

Salient Features: -
• The speed dry layer pulls in wetness instantly and helps in keeping your baby's skin dry.
• Huggies comes with a new Leak lock system which locks wetness away from baby's skin. This is achieved by spreading the fluid throughout the pad and the fluid is locked in the absorbent core.
• "Wear any-side" snug fit allows the pants to be worn any side. This also provides a comfortable snug fit.
• The leakage of the fluid is prevented along the sides with the help of Double Leak Guard.
• Huggies Wonder- Pants is recommended for babies weighing between 7 - 12 kgs.
• Large Size Diapers and contains 48 units.

item.description:
Pigeon Liquid Cleanser For Baby Accessories And Toys:The PIGEON Bottle Nipple & Vegetable Liquid Cleanser is the ultimate natural cleanser and is essential for baby's health. Tried and tested by mothers all over the world, it has proven to be highly effective in killing bacteria found in milk. Made from 100% food grade ingredients, it is safe and effective for cleaning baby accessories, such as bottles, nipples, pacifiers and toys, and is even suitable for washing fruit and vegetables.
Excellent Cleanser with Anti-Bacterial Features: It is not adequate to wash the nursing bottle with water alone. Made from edible carbohydrate delivatives, PIGEON Liquid Cleanser is suitable for washing the nursing bottle because it is able to remove fats and proteins, which cause dirt. PIGEON Liquid Cleanser is a much stronger wash than regular detergent commonly found in kitchens.
Safe for Fruits and Vegetables: Apart from keeping baby's toys and accessories clean, the cleanser can be used to wash fresh produce as well. Made from edible carbohydrate derivatives, the cleanser is great for keeping baby's accessories squeaky clean and is safe for fruits and veggies as well. It is recommended to wash fruits and vegetables before consumption while pregnant because it effectively sterilizes the fresh produce by removing agricultural chemicals. Gentle on Skin:There is no need to worry about dry skin as the cleanser foams lightly and rinses off easily, and works to protect the skin.

item.g:title: Pigeon Steam Sterilizer
item.description:
For 0 month + baby The Pigeon Steam Sterilizer is designed to accommodate up to five standard size or PIGEON Wide-neck Bottles. The nine-minute steam sterilization cycle effectively destroys bacteria, without the need to use chemicals.
How is it used? :Before use, open the lid to take out the Accessory Tray, Stand and Bottle Tray.Then, measure 70ml of clean water with milk bottle and pour into the Bottle Chamber.To sterilize bottles, first invert the bottles and place them onto the Bottle Tray. Then, lower the tray into the Bottle Chamber.To sterilize your accessories, such as nipples and pacifiers, place them onto the Accessory Tray.Close the lid completely.Depress the Power-On switch. The Light indicator will lit and the sterilizing process run for 9 minutes.Easy Maintenance Bottle Chamber can be detached from Heater for easy cleaning.It Automatically switches off when sterilising cycle is complete.Sterilising time of 10 to 12 minutes
Cleaning Instructions:Lemon Juice Cleaning, weekly once:1. Extract Lemon Juice into a mug .2. Pour into the steriliser without boiling.3. Leave to stay for 30 minutes 4. Use a soft cloth to remove remaining limesacle .5. Drain & rinse steriliser with clean water"

item.g:title: Pigeon Peristaltic Nipple Plastic Bottle Small 120ml
item.description: Breast milk is the best source of nutrition for your baby especially during the first year after birth. In addition the time spent breastfeeding strengthens the bond between mother and baby. However where bottle feeding is necessary we recommend using the PIGEON Peristaltic Nipple to encourage babys natural tongue movement. The ultra soft silicone rubber with double thickness ensures ideal softness and elasticity so baby can latch on easily and comfortably. Also the shape fits perfectly with your babys tongue allowing smooth tongue movement while minimizing air intake. The nipples roomy base helps your baby open his mouth widely therebyÂ encouraging steady peristaltic motion. The streamlined shape makes it easy for mothers to hold and keep clean. Made of high quality durable polycarbonate plastic the wide neck opening makes preparation of formula milk for baby simple and effortless. Teat section has an accordion like portion that enables it to stretch in response to the peristaltic movement of the babys tongue. At PIGEON we believe that stretchability is the most important function of an artificial nipple in encouraging babys natural suckling. The nipples surface is very soft yet it does not collapse easily. Made from thick ultra soft silicone material the nipple has similar elasticity to that of a mothers actual breast. The dome like shape makes babys mouth open naturally supports its mouth softly and fits its lips gently. S is recommended for newborns up to three months old baby for slow flow.

item.g:title: Nestle Cerelac Wheat - Rice Moong Dal Veg Khichdi Stage 2
item.description: Cerelac is a complementary food for babies after 6 months when breast milk alone can no longer totally cover the baby’s growing nutritional requirements. Mother's milk is best for your baby.Infant food shall be introduced only after the age of 6 Months and up to the age of 2 years.Key FeaturesIt is free from added artificial colours, flavours and preservativesEach serve of Cerelac provides the goodness of cereals with 18 important nutrientsProvides the combined benefit of cereals and pulsesIngredients - Green gram flour, Rice flour, Wheat flour, Ghee, Rice crunchies, Skimmed milk powder, Tomato paste, Soybean oil, Minerals, Sucrose, Spinach crunchies, Carrot crunchies, Tomato crunchies and Vitamins Storage Instructions - After opening this pack, the content should immediately be transferred to an empty, clean, dry & airtight container. After each use, replace lid tightly & store in a cool & dry place. Preparation Directions - Wash your hands. Use clean utensils. Boil drinking water for 5 minutes. Leave it till lukewarm. Pour 95 ml of lukewarm water into a bowl. Add 4 level scoops of Cerelac. Stir until pap is smooth. Feed your baby with a clean spoon.Suggested Usage - Complementary food for babies after 6 months when breast milk alone can no longer totally cover the baby's growing nutritional requirements Specifications:Brand - NestleType - Shishu Aahaar Wheat Rice Moong Dal Veg KhichidiAge - 8 to 24 MonthsIs the product container glass or fragile - NoIs the product a liquid - NoStage - 2Total Weight - 300 gmSafety Warning - Careful and hygienic preparation of infant food is most essential for health. Do not use fewer scoops than directed, since diluted feeding will not provide adequate nutrition needed by your infant. Do not use more scoops than directed, since concentrated feed will not provide the water needed by your infant. Infant food should be used only on the advice of a health worker as to the need for its use and the proper method of its use. The world health organization recommends exclusive breastfeeding for 6 months. Nestle supports this recommendation. Since babies vary in their needs, consult your healthcare professional for advice on when to introduce Cerelac to your child. Breastfeeding should continue for as long as possible after introduction of weaning foods. Items included in the Package:Total Weight 300 gm of Shishu Aahaar Wheat Rice Moong Dal Veg Khichidi Stage 2""

item.g:title: Junior Horlicks 4 5 6 Original Stage 2 500 Refill
item.description: The early years are vital for a child's physical and mental development. As a parent, you would naturally be keen to ensure that your child gets the best nutrition possible for his optimal growth. Nutritional requirements vary according to age.Toddlers are fussy eaters, which may lead to gaps in nutrition. Pre-schoolers, on the other hand, tend to have a busy schedule and need adequate nutrition to keep them going through the day. It is therefore important to manage the different nutritional needs of your child according to his age. To bridge gaps in nutrition and aid your child's overall development, it may be important to include a nutritional supplement or beverage such as Junior Horlicks as part of the daily diet.Salient Features: -• Original Flavour• Suitable for Stage 2• Junior Horlicks Net Quantity: 500gm Refill""

item.g:title: Nestle Nan Pro Stage 4 Refill 400Gm
item.description: NAN PRO 4 is a spray dried Infant Formula for infants after 18 months when they are not breastfed Important Notice: Mother's milk is best for your baby Ingredients- Milk solids, Maltodextrin, Low erucic rapeseed oil, Coconut oil, High oleic sunflower oil, Sunflower oil, Minerals (Calcium citrate, Sodium citrate, Potassium phosphate dibasic, Magnesium chloride, Ferrous sulphate, Sodium chloride iodized, Zinc sulphate, Cupric sulphate, Manganese sulphate, Potassium iodide, Sodium selenite), Antioxidant (Soya lecithin), Vitamins (Choline bitartrate, Sodium ascorbate, dl-alpha-tocopheryl acetate, Nicotinamide, Calcium pantothenate, Pyridoxine hydrochloride, Thiamine mononitrate, Riboflavin, Retinyl acetate, Folic acid, Phytylmenaquinone, Ergocalciferol, d-Biotin, Cyanocobalamine), Antioxidant (L-ascorbyl palmitate) and Acidity regulators (Citric acid, Potassium hydroxide). Storage Instructions- After opening use the contents within 3 weeks or the expiry date, whichever is earlier. On opening, transfer the contents of the pack along with the pouch into a clean air tight container. After each use, replace lid tightly and store in a cool, dry place. Directions- * Wash your hands * Sterilize utensils including the feeding bowl and spoon * Boil drinking water for 5 minutes and leave it till lukewarm * Pour exact amount of lukewarm water as per feeding table * Consult feeding table and add exact number of leveled scoops for age of baby * Only use scoop provided. Shake/mix to dissolve powder. * Feed the baby with bowl and spoon. Discard leftover feed. Safety Warning- Unboiled water, unboiled utensils or incorrect dilution can make your baby ill. Incorrect storage, handling, preparation and feeding can potentially lead to adverse effects for the health of your baby. Only prepare one feed at a time. Feed immediately and follow the instructions exactly. Do not keep unfinished feed, discard the contents. Always hold baby while feeding. Leaving baby unattended may cause choking. Infant food should be used only on the advice of a health worker as to the need for its use and the proper method of its use. Infant food is not the sole source of nourishment of an infant. Infant food shall be introduced only after the age of six months and upto the age of two years. Careful and hygienic preparation of infant food is most essential for health. Do not use fewer scoops than directed, since diluted feeding will not provide adequate nutrients needed by your infant. Do not use more scoops than directed, since concentrated feed will not provide the water needed by your infant. Ensure enclosed scoop is throuroughly washed and dried before use. After opening use the content within 3 weeks or the expiry date, whichever is earlier. Suggested Usage- Nestle NAN PRO 4 is a spray dried Follow-up Formula for older infants after 18 months when they are not breastfed.""

item.g:title: Nestle Baby & Me Vanilla Flavour 400 Gm
item.description: Nestle Baby & me is a maternal nutrition supplement which is meant for pregnant and breastfeeding mothers. It contains Probiotics which help support your baby’s immunity along with DHA & 19 micro nutrients for healthy growth & development. Nestle Baby & Me is a maternal nutrition supplement which is meant for breastfeeding mothers as well. It contains Probiotics which help support your baby’s immunity along with DHA & 19 micro nutrients for healthy growth & development. Also, there are advantages of the product such as:Probiotic cultures (Lactobacillus Rhamnosus+B Lactis). Probiotic cultures help in the digestive comfort for mothers and also help in supporting immunity in the baby.Pleasant taste and aroma. Additionally, reconstitution is recommended with milk to build on nutrition and also helps improve the taste and aroma of milk which might be a problem for pregnant women.Fortified formulation with added Macro and Micronutrients for mother’s increased requirements as well as growth and development of the baby.Key Features:It contains Probiotics during pregnancy which help strengthen your baby's natural defences.It contains DHA & 19 micronutrients which help to provide healthy growth & development to your baby.Protein, Iron, Calcium, Vitamin D, B 1 help meet increased nutritional requirements and support your baby's healthy growth and developmentIngredients - Milk solids, Sucrose, Maltodextrin, Rapeseed oil, Sunflower oil, Minerals, High oleic sunflower oil, Vitamins, Algal oil, Antioxidant (Soya lecithin), Probiotic cultures [Lactobacillus rhamnosus (0.0207%) and Bifidobacterium lactis (0.0059%)]Storage Instructions - On opening the pack, transfer the contents to a clean air tight container. After each use, replace lid tightly and store in a cool, dry place.How To Prepare:Add 4-leveled table spoons (35 g) of powder to 200 ml of warm or cold milk and stir well. Important: For best results, use lukewarm milk (less than 45 degree Celsius)Safety Warning - Important Notice Baby & Me is a nutritional supplement for pregnant women and breastfeeding mothers. It is not an infant formula. It is exclusively intended for the use of adults.Suggested Usage - Nutritional supplement for Pregnant Women & Breastfeeding MothersSpecifications:Brand - NestleType - Baby & Me Nutritional SupplementWeight - 400 gmIs the product container glass or fragile - NoIs the product a liquid - NoFlavour - VanillaStorage Information: On opening the pack, transfer the contents to a clean air tight container.After each use, replace lid tightly and store in cool, dry placeUse within 3 weeks of openingItems included in the Package:400 gm of Nestle Baby & Me Vanilla Flavour""

item.g:title: Johnson'S Baby Shampoo 100Ml
item.description: Did you know? Your baby blinks less often, tears less and it takes time for her eyes to develop blink reflex. This makes it easier for unwanted substances to cause irritation. That's why Johnson's baby shampoo is specially designed to be gentle & mild to the eyes as pure water. The new No More Tears formula cleanses gently and easily, leaving your baby’s hair soft & healthy.Ingredients: -Water, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Citric Acid, Polysorbate 20, PEG-80 Sorbitan Laurate, Sodium Benzoate, PEG-150 Distearate, Polyquaternium-10, CI 47005, CI15985, Fragrance.Salient Features:-• Designed with NO MORE TEARS formula, to be mild as pure water to baby’s eyes• 100% Clinically proven mild & gentle• Dermatologist tested, Allergy tested• Every Johnson’s product passes a 5 Level safety assurance process• Net Shampoo Quantity: 100mlDirections of Use: -• Apply on wet hair, gently lather, rinse.• Safety Tip: For external use only.• Keep out of reach of children.• Discontinue use if skin irritation occurs.""

item.g:title: Yogi Kanthika 140S
item.description: Yogi Kanthika is a 100% ayurvedic and sugar-free formulation with no side-effects. As you suck the pill, the juices of herbs are absorbed by the throat muscles and soothe the scratchy pain and irritation from all types of throat problems. The presence of following ingredients heals your throat: Jeshthamadh (Mulethi or Licorice) which is the base ingredient provides relief from sore throat, cough and hoarseness of voice. Works as an anti-inflammatory agent for throat swelling (Tonsillitis) as well as Freshens breath. Sunth (Adrak or Ginger) soothes inflammation, pain and swelling, removes mucus and relieves spasms associated with intense coughing. Also effective in treating allergies that cause respiratory ailments like asthma and bronchitis. Jaiphal (Nutmeg) clears your throat from excess sputum, improving voice quality as well as freshens your breath. Tulasi (Holy Basil) provides relief from cough and also acts as an oral disinfectant. Its antibacterial property prevents development of respiratory infections. Shitalchini (Java Pepper) provides relief from sinusitis as well as nasal congestion. Pudina (Mint leaves) cures leaves further bacterial asthma and your mouth with a minty flavor. Ajwain (Celery) has antimicrobial properties which relieves throat congestion. Karpoor (Camphor) relieves pain and discomfort caused by coughing. Babool (Acacia powder) soothes the membranes of inflamed pharynx providing relief from cough.Sucking of each pill leaves a soothing and pain-free effect on the throat.Consumption: It can be consumed any time of the day in addition to any other medicines. You can feel the effect on your throat in 1-2 days. Dosage:Dosage:For Age group 5 to 12 years: 1-2 pills to be sucked 5-6 times a day For Age group more than 12 years: 2-3 pills to be sucked 5-6 times a dayFor Pregnant women: Not advisable during first 3 month of pregnancy. You can consume it after your first trimester (only after consulting the gynaecologist).""

Sources of LA include safflower, hemp and sunflower oils whilst GLA is naturally found in hemp seed oil and human breast milk.

item.description: Controlling calories intake is best approach to attain fitness. Hectic lifestyles busy schedule erratic eating habits can upset every day fitness schedule. By switching to SugarFree natura which is a diet sugar made of sucralose you can keep away from much more calories on a daily basis. Health experts suggest reducing the sugars added to food and beverages. SugarFree natura can be used as a sweetener to reduce calories in food and beverages while maintaining great taste. Studies have shown that food and beverages sweetened with SugarFree natura can be a part of daily life to maintain good health and reduce weight. Substituting your regular sweetener with SugarFree natura as believed to be diet sugar which tastes completely like sugar can help in a reduced intake of many calories on a daily basis and help you in reducing weight and stay fit. SugarFree natura diet sugar is suitable for diabetic patients as well. Instead of staying away from sweets and beverages they can embrace all the sweetness in life along with using SugarFree natura.

item.g:title: Sat Isabgol Powder 200GM
item.description: Sat-Isabgol is derived from the seeds of plant called 'Plantaqo Ovata'. Sat-Isabgol is also known as Psyllium Husks, Sat-Isabgol, and Ispaqhula. item.g:title: Dabur Sitopaladi Churan 60G
item.description: Dabur Sitopaladi Churna: Dabur Sitopaladi Churna is a traditional Ayurvedic formulation for treatment of cough and colds. It is made from herbs like Pippali which is used extensively as a spice and for medicinal purposes. Piper longum (Pipalli) is an immuno modulating herb. A common use of the fruit is in the prevention of respiratory tract disorders including Asthma. Anti-allergic activity of the fruit has been studied and is attributed to piperine. It is one of the best expectorants available in nature. Besides herbs sugar is also used in the formulation. It gets absorbed into the body and provides nutrition and energy to digest the mucous conditions. Sitopaladi is a botanical alternative medicine formulation which aids in the relief of respiratory tract disorders. Dabur Sitopaladi is quick acting tasty powder which is a blend of anti-allergic bronchodilator and immunomodulal on herbs. Indications of Dabur Sitopaladi Churna : * Cough * Cold and flu * Fever * Breathing disorders. Ingredients of Dabur Sitopaladi Churna : * Bambusa arundinacea * Piper longum * Elettaria cardamomum * Cinnamomum zeylanicum. Dosage of Dabur Sitopaladi Churna : 3 to 5 gm (1/2 to 1 teaspoonful) twice a day with honey or as directed by the Physician.

item.g:title: Tetmosol Soap 75G
item.description: What is Tetmosol?Tetmosol soap is a GRADE I medicated soap. It is mainly used for treatment and prevention from scabies and related skin problems like itching, skin irritation, inflammation, rashes, redness on skin. It also works against head and body lice. It can be used for entire body including the head scalp.Tetmosol Medicated soap has mild fragrance that will keep your skin fresh. It can be used even as a regular bathing soap every day.When to use Tetmosol?Tetmosol Medicated Soap can be used for curing scabies and related skin problems like itching, skin irritation, inflammation, rashes and redness on skin. It also works against head and body lice.It can be used for solving, controlling and as preventive measure against such problems. Tetmosol can be used for entire body including the head scalp.Key IngredientsMonosulfiram 5% w/w (active ingredient) with Citronella oilTotal Fatty Matter – minimum 75%How does Tetmosol work?Itching in scabies is caused due to movement of mites under your skin. Tetmosol contains monosulfiram which is toxic to the mites. Once the mites come in contact with monosulfiram, they cannot move. Hence you get an immediate relief from itching. Within a few hours of exposure to this drug, the mites die, thus curing you from the scabies infection.These mites are the infective cause of scabies and related skin problems.How to Use• Wet yourself with lukewarm water.• Apply Tetmosol soap all over your body paying special attention to the folds of your skin. Lather liberally.• Rinse off with lukewarm water.• After bathing, the body should be allowed to dry naturally or dried with a towel using a 'blotting' action.• Over application of Tetmosol is unlikely to cause adverse effect.• Tetmosol Soap should be used daily and can be used even after the problem is cured as prevention.• It is suitable for both adults and children.• It is only for external use.Frequency of UseTetmosol soap can be used on a daily basis, instead of your regular soap, to keep away scabies and related skin problems.Precautions• Take special care that lather of Tetmosol does not enter your eyes.• Do not use this soap if you are allergic to sulphur.• Do not use if there is adverse reaction from previous use""
item.g:product_type: PERSONAL CARE > BATH & BODY > SOAP > FMCG > SHOP BY BRAND > TETMOSOL

The main ingredient is fruit Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHAs), a concentrate obtained by a distillation of orange, citron, sugar cane, blueberry and maple. Along with vitamin CG, a stable form of vitamin C, gentian extract also inhibits the pigmentation process for fairer skin.

item.g:title: Apollo Pharmacy Nasochoice Nasal Spray 10ml
item.description: What is Apollo Pharmacy Nasochoice? Apollo Pharmacy Nasochoice is used as a topical decongestant and is applied directly into the nose either as spray or drops it gives temporarily relief from nasal congestion due to cold flue sinusitis & nasal allergies. What is nasal congestion? A congested or stuffy nose is caused by inflamed blood vessels in the membranes lining the inside of your nostrils usually due to the flu cold or allergies. You tend to have lots of mucus in your nose which can make difficult to breathe. How does Nasochoice help? When Apollo Pharmacy Nasochoice is sprayed or dropped it opens up the nasal passages by reducing the excessive nasal secretions and returns the swollen blood vessels to their normal size.

item.g:title: Doctor's Choice Hot & Cold Gel Pack Large
item.description: Doctor's Choice Hot N Cold Gel Pack Large for Hot pack by the use of Boiling Water: Place the gel pack in the boiled water for 2 to 3 minutes. Remove the pack from the boiled water. Wipe it clean with cloth and place in cloth cover. Now the pack is ready to use. By the Use of Microwave Oven: Place the gel pack in the microwave oven for 60 to 70 seconds on high power. Remove the gel pack from the oven and place it in the cloth cover provided and the pack is ready to use. The time of microwave depends upon the initial temperature of the pack. In winter gel pack may take more time to get heated. For Cold pack by the use of freezer: Place the pack in the freezer for 25-35 minutes and the pack is ready to use.

item.g:title: Doctor'S Choice Isopropyl Rubbing Alcohol U.S.P 100Ml
item.description: Doctor's choice isopropyl alcohol (ipa) liquid is a high purity, multipurpose cleaner and solvent. First aid antiseptic. To decrease germs in minor cuts and scrapes. Applications and usages since isopropyl alcohol is safe for most plastics, seals, ceramics and printed circuit board components, it is used heavily in the electronics industry. It is great for cleaning screens, stencils, fiber optics, cables, keypads, printed circuit board components or electrical contacts and connectors. It is also used to clean oxides and grime on audio or video tape heads. It effectively removes light greases, oils and flux without adding additional residues to contacts, relays and circuit boards connectors."

item.g:title: HIMALAYA DIABECON DS TABLET 60'S
item.description:
Ayurveda texts and modern research back the following facts:

Shilajeet decreases hepatic glucose production and prevents hyperglycemia. Shilajeet has a protective action on b-cells of the pancreas, and promotes unrestricted endogenous insulin action.

Gymnema’s (Meshashringi) principal constituent is gymnemic acid, which has antidiabetic properties. It reduces excessive blood sugar. It also has a regenerative effect on pancreatic beta cells and is insulinotropic, which means that it stimulates the production and activity of insulin. Gymnema temporarily abolishes the taste for sugar and helps decrease sugar cravings. It increases the activity of enzymes responsible for glucose absorption and utilization.

Indian Kino Tree’s (Pitasara) principal constituent, epicatechin, has alpha-glucosidase inhibitory properties and regularizes key metabolic enzymes involved in carbohydrate metabolism.

Directions for use:

Please consult your physician to prescribe the dosage that best suits the condition.

Available as a tablet.

Side effects:

Diabecon DS is not known to have any side effects if taken as per the prescribed dosage.

For information on clinical research Click here

The information on this page is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice. Do not use this information to diagnose or treat your problem without consulting your doctor.

item.g:title: Optimum Nutrition (ON) Fish Oil 1000 mg - 200 Softgels
item.description:
Optimum nutrition fish oil consists of main components: long-chain fatty acids docosahexenoic acid (DHA) and eicosapentaenoic acid (EPA). Your body cannot produce DHA & EPA fats and thus these are very essential. Foods like salmon and supplements such as fish oil capsules are the only rich sources of DHA & EPA. You won’t be getting the fishy aftertaste as these softgels are enteric coated. Reap the benefits of these capsules without the fishy taste and increase your DHA & EPA fat content.

Salient Features: -
• Contains long-chain fatty acids like docosahexenoic acid (DHA) and eicosapentaenoic acid (EPA).
• No fishy aftertaste due to the enteric coating on the softgels.
• DHA and EPA are very good for the heart and brain.
• DHA and EPA are essential fats that cannot be made by your body the fish oil softgels supplements them.
• Contains 200 softgels of potency 1000mg.

"

item.g:title: BSN Syntha 6 - 5 Lbs (Chocolate Milkshake)
item.description:
Product Description
Syntha-6 consists of ultra-premium lean muscle protein powder. It is the best-tasting protein supplement on the market. Multiple quality proteins are part of this enhanced formula each of which provides a unique and complementary profile of amino acids and absorption rates resulting in a nutritious and multi-functional protein supplement. High-quality protein is essential for building and maintaining lean muscle mass for any athlete. Syntha-6 is the best to match that high standard of quality & taste. BSN has an exclusive technology which helps in some of the most mouthwatering shakes imaginable making protein supplementation with Syntha-6 irresistibly delicious. Fiber and healthy fats are included in Syntha-6. This makes Syntha-6 a healthy meal replacement option and it can be included in a balanced weight management diet plan. Its variable digestion rates ultra-premium protein and easy adaptability make Syntha-6 the perfect complement to a variety of diet and exercise regimens. Not only is Syntha-6 nutritious and delicious but also Syntha-6 is the superior choice among protein supplements.

From the Manufacturer
Syntha
Ultra-Premium Lean Muscle Protein Powder

SYNTHA-6 is an ultra-premium protein powder. This protein powder is BSN’s best tasting protein you can find on the market. SYNTHA-6 is an excellent source of fiber and contains 6g of fat per serving beside including essential amino and fatty acids.This makes it a multi-functional and nutritious protein supplement. SYNTHA-6 is the go-to protein for any nutrition or exercise regimen because it is designed to suit a variety of active lifestyles and diet plans. And with SYNTHA-6 the high standard of quality protein comes with taste to match thanks to BSN's exclusive flavor technology.

Ridiculously Delicious

BSN broke through the protein flavor barrier once and for all with the introduction of SYNTHA-6. Available in over 10 decadent flavors SYNTHA-6 mixes like a delicious milkshake and is designed for any individual who wants to supplement daily protein intake to help reach their nutritional and physique goals.

Protein Supplementation

Daily adequate protein intake is important for a healthy & regular exercise regimen. Protein is needed to help repair muscle broken down during exercise and build new muscle. Using a quality protein powder is essential to supplement the daily amount of protein required by your body.Syntha-6 will help you to reap the benefits from every training session.

BSN Supplementation
BSN products are designed in such a manner to complement one another.Using these products together will help you enhance the benefits of your supplementation and get the best out of these products.

Optimal Usage

Step-1:Take 1 scoop with 4-5 oz of cold water or any beverage of your choice.
Step-2: Vary the amount of liquid as per your desired flavor and consistency.
Step-3: Use Syntha-6 as a post workout recovery shake at any time during the day.

""

item.g:title: Nature's Best Isopure Zero Carb - 7.5 Lbs (Strawberries & Cream)
item.description:
ISOPURE Low Carb
Want to get powerfully pure protein at the same time without packing on carbs? Our 100% whey protein isolate powder then is definitely for you! Simply pick your level: Zero Carb or Low-Carb (which also has Zero sugar) both with a whopping 50 grams of protein. Stay assured as this is 100% whey protein isolate and is enriched with vitamins minerals and nutrients to keep you going strong. Stay safe without any gluten lactose or any impurities. Our complete microfiltration process ensures that ISOPURE Low Carb (Strawberry Flavour) is the only completely clear milk protein when dissolved in water. Enjoy this protein in a range of delicious flavors to mix up some seriously delicious and dynamic recipes.

Note: Vitamin/Mineral premix are present in protein which might not be soluble. They will be cloudy when dissolved.
We're All More Than Muscle
Hal and Ernie started ISOPUREwith a cement mixer and an idea to make things better. The aim was to be a solver of people’s problems. Since then we’ve been working for 30 years to make products that offer the cleanest purest protein around.

We strive to develop protein that is completely free of lactose low calorie with little or no fat impurities or carbs. We're for people who want protein with the highest absorption rate and for those who want to do more.

We aim for the highest standards - Beyond quality.
25 grams of protein per serving
100 percent whey protein isolate
Gluten free lactose free and aspartame free
Glutamine enriched loaded with BCAAs
Protein that's pure and perfect
This is protein with taste
100% WPI
0g Carbs
210 Calories
50g Protein

item.g:title: Optimum Nutrition (ON) 100% Whey Gold Standard - 5 lbs (Cookies & Cream)
item.description:
100% Whey is the industry’s best-selling gold protein and it uses a Gold standard of quality. This whey is made in GMP compliant company owned and operated facilities in the U.S.A. Pure Whey Protein Isolates is used as the primary ingredient in Gold Standard 100% Whey. This whey is combined with ultra-filtered whey protein concentrate. Many athletes have acknowledged the muscle building qualities of Whey Gold Standards. Each serving provides 24 grams of all-whey protein and 5.5 grams of naturally occurring Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs). Keep your workouts interesting with more than 20 flavours to choose from this Gold Standard 100% Whey.
True Strength of Optimum Nutrition
There isn’t any resting or quitting involved in true strength. It is a continuous journey. Overcoming obstacles accomplishing goals and recognizing achievements is a part of that journey. ON demonstrates that same passion while crafting our products and is your trusted sports nutrition partner in goal achievement. There are no compromises whatsoever right from the raw materials we source to our state-of-the-art manufacturing processes. While you set the bar higher after every workout we set the bar higher to redefine the industry standards and ensure you realize optimum results.
The ‘Gold’ Standard
Gold Standard 100% Whey consists of Whey protein isolates and these are the purest form of whey. Each serving provides 24 grams of rapidly digesting whey protein. Whey Protein also contains low levels of fat cholesterol lactose amongst others which you can do without making Gold Standard 100% Whey the standard all other proteins are measured against.

Whey protein isolates are the primary ingredients (24gms) and 100% Whey (Cookies & Cream) contains just 1gram of sugar and fat.
• 5.5 grams of naturally occurring Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs).
• Over 4 grams of glutamic acid and glutamine in each serving.
• Whey protein isolate and ultrafiltered whey protein concentrate are used to produce Whey protein microfractions.
• Should be used in the mornings before/after exercise or after weight training.

""

item.description:

1. Crisscross Absorbent sheet– A cross embossed pattern of lines run on the absorbent sheet of the diaper. These lines are designed to ensure that urine is evenly spread to all parts of the diaper ensuring diaper is not bulky at one point. This is evenly spread which reduces rashes.
2. BREATHABLE COTTON-LIKE COVER – A unique breathable cotton like cover which allows air to pass through. This makes your child more comfortable for longer time.
3. An Elastic wide band – MamyPoko Pants are made with special All-round elastic waist band which ensures that the baby is comfortable without being tight or lose on baby’s body. Always gentle on the skin and Mammy Poko Pants makes sure that leakage is prevented. The Pants are designed so that they last for up to 12 hours taking care of your baby.
4. Urine absorbency – MamyPoko extra absorb diaper prevents leakage. This excellent absorbent can absorb up to seven glasses of urine, hence baby feels light up to 12 hours.
5. Baby Weight – This is best suited for a baby with a weight between 7-12 kg.

item.g:title: Pampers Baby Dry Pants M 80'S
item.description:
This Cottony Comfort pants is easy to Use. Designed with the purpose to keep your baby’s skin dry and let the skin breathe easy. Pampers Diaper pants contain an outer layer of cotton-like softness, this baby diaper provides intense care to your baby's sensitive skin and protects it effectively from friction rash and redness.

Pampers have come up featuring a pant style design, these diapers are easy to put on your baby and change. This comes as a great help to mothers and allows your little one to find it interesting too! There are colourful cartoon picture in the front which are carefully designed for your child. Not only will these baby diapers offer complete protection and care but also, they will ensure that your child keeps smiling and stay comfortable.

A touch of Gentle Care and Nourishment for Your Little One
Pampers diaper pants is designed to make your baby will laugh and play in comfort. This diaper is infused with baby lotion which moisturizes and nourishes your baby's skin. The moisturising effect also helps protect your child from rashes and skin irritation problems. Magic gel layer is a new technology which helps these baby diaper pants effectively absorb up to 6 glasses of fluid from the surface of the diaper thereby protecting your baby's delicate skin.

Pampers Baby dry pants offers up to 12 hours of dryness protection and thus you are free from the trouble of changing your baby’s diapers in the nights.

Salient Features: -
• The no. 1 driest pants
• Comfortable fit with flexible waistband
• Up to 12 hours of dryness with pampers magic gel technology
• Keeps baby skin fresh with breathable soft belt and cuffs
• Faster absorption with larger absorbency zone inside diapers
• Medium size pants with 80 units
• Special baby lotion offers exclusive skin protection
• New improved design with fun colors and shapes

item.g:title: Women's Horlicks Chocolate Flavour 400gm Refill
item.description:
Product Description: -
Women’s Horlicks is a nutritional beverage and you must include this as a part of your daily diet. The nutrients present help meet the increased calorie requirements during pregnancy. Micronutrients such as Iron, Iodine, Folic acid, zinc, Magnesium, vitamin A, B6, B12, and D are present in Women’s Horlicks which are known to help improve birth weight of the baby. Dietary interventions or supplementation during pregnancy can increase the secretion of these nutrients in breast milk. It also provides nutrients (vitamin B1, B2, B6, B12, A, iodine, selenium). These nutrients aid in the secretion of breast milk during your lactation time periods.

From the Manufacturer: -
Women’s Horlicks has been specially created at the Horlicks Nutrition Academy. This is done by combining scientific knowledge and expertise. Women’s Horlicks is specially formulated with no added Sugar 27 and contains low fat 26. It is the first and only health drink in India containing the complete list of micronutrients recommended for women by the World Health Organization (WHO).

Salient Features: -
• Specialized nutrition for women
• 100% RDA of Vitamin D for calcium absorption
• Contains nutrients important for bone health
• 100% RDA of Calcium for strong bones
• Chocolate flavoured Refill which has a net quantity of 400gm

item.g:title: BSN True Mass - 5 Lbs (Chocolate Milkshake)
item.description:
The ultimate mass gainer engineered for the true hard gainer in need of serious caloric support. True mass 1200 features a 4:1 ratio of carbohydrates to protein with 215 grams of a unique complex carbohydrate blend that includes ground whole oats and 50 grams of BSN's signature protein formula along. Plus, the formula includes 12 grams of naturally occurring BCAAs and 25 grams of EAAs per serving along with added dietary fiber and medium chain triglycerides to round out the nutritional value of each shake. Used post workout, between meals or before bed, true mass 1200 can fuel your recovery from heavy training while providing the nutrients your body needs to keep on building gain with the best of them. Features BSN's signature ultra premium protein formula to feed an athlete's muscles with the essential protein building blocks. The unique carbohydrate blend provides the caloric support necessitated by extreme physical exertion, helping the body prepare for and support recovery from intense training. Healthy fats supply quick burning fuel to satisfy the serious athlete's energy demands. And all these high quality ingredients come delivered with BSN's exclusive flavor technology, producing one of the most mouth watering mass gaining shakes on the market. BSN's protein powders, such as Syntha 6 and Syntha 6 isolate are comprised primarily of protein and contain only small amounts of fats and carbohydrates, while staying under approximately 200 calories per serving. These protein powders are recommended to supplement regular protein intake through out the day and as a post workout recovery shake. While true mass 1200 is used for these applications as well, due to its high protein, carbohydrate and calorie count, this ultimate mass gainer is geared towards athletes who require an above normal caloric intake. Ultra-Premium Protein/Carbohydrate Matrix

True-Mass is an ultra-premium lean mass gainer, designed to support muscle growth and muscle recovery for athletes with above normal caloric needs. The formula behind True-Mass features a 2-to-1 ratio of workout-fueling carbohydrates to muscle building protein, with 90 grams of carbs per serving and 50 grams of protein at 710 calories. Plus, we included 6 grams of dietary fiber per serving and Medium Chain Triglycerides to round out the nutritional value of each shake and complement BSN’s legendary great taste. Used post-workout, between meals and/or before bed, True-Mass can fuel your recovery from heavy training while providing the nutrients your body needs to keep on building.

""

item.g:title: Optimum Nutrition (ON) Pro BCAA - 390 Gm (Fruit Punch)
item.description:
Strength trainers and endurance athletes have been using Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs) for a long time now.The BCAAs help them activate the muscle synthesis and reduce muscle breakdown. This is caused due to intense training and Optimum Nutrition has come up with the right box of BCAAs for you. The Instantized BCAA 5000 mg powder is made using a proprietary process which helps in readily mixing and keeps the BCAAs suspended for a longer duration of time so that they don’t readily settle at the bottom of your glass. This makes it easy for you to drink your BCAAs.

Salient Features: -
• First completely instantized BCAA powder
• 5 grams of BCAAs per serving in the preferred 2:1:1 ratio of Leucine to Isoleucine and Valine
• Instantized and helps in mixing easily into water. Mix with your favorite juice or post-workout shakes.
• Helps activate protein synthesis while reducing catabolic muscle breakdown.
• To be used before or during strength training and endurance training.

Quality Counts: GMP Certified Products

Optimum Nutrition's commitment to quality products is evident across its development process. All vendors must provide a Certificate of Analysis for each raw material supplied as a continued measure of quality assurance. The certified analyses are also verified through random in-house and independent laboratory testing.

To further diminish any chance of physical, chemical, and microbiological contaminants, ON has established and implemented a Hazard Analysis Critical Control Point (HACCP) program. There are quality assurance routine checks made on all storage, blending, and production areas and conduct daily inspections.

"

item.g:title: BSN Syntha 6 - 2.9 Lbs (Chocolate Milkshake)
item.description:
Product Description

Syntha-6 consists of ultra-premium lean muscle protein powder. It is the best-tasting protein supplement on the market. Multiple quality proteins are part of this enhanced formula, each of which provides a unique and complementary profile of amino acids and absorption rates, resulting in a nutritious and multi-functional protein supplement. High-quality protein is essential for building and maintaining lean muscle mass for any athlete. Syntha-6 is the best to match that high standard of quality & taste. BSN has an exclusive technology which helps in some of the most mouthwatering shakes imaginable, making protein supplementation with Syntha-6 irresistibly delicious. Fiber and healthy fats are included in Syntha-6. This makes Syntha-6 a healthy meal replacement option and it can be included in a balanced weight management diet plan. Its variable digestion rates, ultra-premium protein and easy adaptability make Syntha-6 the perfect complement to a variety of diet and exercise regimens. Not only is Syntha-6 nutritious and delicious, but also Syntha-6 is the superior choice among protein supplements.

From the Manufacturer
Syntha
Ultra-Premium Lean Muscle Protein Powder

SYNTHA-6 is an ultra-premium protein powder. This protein powder is BSN’s best tasting protein you can find on the market. SYNTHA-6 is an excellent source of fiber and contains 6g of fat per serving beside including essential amino and fatty acids.This makes it a multi-functional and nutritious protein supplement. SYNTHA-6 is the go-to protein for any nutrition or exercise regimen because it is designed to suit a variety of active lifestyles and diet plans. And with SYNTHA-6, the high standard of quality protein comes with taste to match, thanks to BSN's exclusive flavor technology.

Ridiculously Delicious

BSN broke through the protein flavor barrier once and for all with the introduction of SYNTHA-6. Available in over 10 decadent flavors, SYNTHA-6 mixes like a delicious milkshake and is designed for any individual who wants to supplement daily protein intake to help reach their nutritional and physique goals.

Protein Supplementation

Daily adequate protein intake is important for a healthy & regular exercise regimen. Protein is needed to help repair muscle broken down during exercise and build new muscle. Using a quality protein powder is essential to supplement the daily amount of protein required by your body.Syntha-6 will help you to reap the benefits from every training session.

BSN Supplementation

BSN products are designed in such a manner to complement one another.Using these products together will help you enhance the benefits of your supplementation and get the best out of these products.

Optimal Usage

Step-1:Take 1 scoop with 4-5 oz of cold water or any beverage of your choice.
Step-2: Vary the amount of liquid as per your desired flavor and consistency.
Step-3: Use Syntha-6 as a post workout recovery shake at any time during the day.

""

item.g:title: Optimum Nutrition (ON) 100% Whey Gold Standard - 2 Lbs (Vanilla Ice Cream)
item.description:
100% Whey is the industry’s best-selling gold protein and it uses a Gold standard of quality. This whey is made in GMP compliant company owned and operated facilities in the U.S.A.Pure Whey Protein Isolates is used as the primary ingredient in Gold Standard 100% Whey. This whey is combined with ultra-filtered whey protein concentrate. Many athletes have acknowledged the muscle building qualities of Whey Gold Standards. Each serving provides 24 grams of all-whey protein and 5.5 grams of naturally occurring Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs). Keep your workouts interesting with more than 20 flavours to choose from this Gold Standard 100% Whey.

True Strength of Optimum Nutrition

There isn’t any resting or quitting involved in true strength. It is a continuous journey. Overcoming obstacles, accomplishing goals, and recognizing achievements is a part of that journey. ON demonstrates that same passion while crafting our products and is your trusted sports nutrition partner in goal achievement. There are no compromises whatsoever, right from the raw materials we source to our state-of-the-art manufacturing processes. While you set the bar higher after every workout, we set the bar higher to redefine the industry standards and ensure you realize optimum results.

The ‘Gold’ Standard

Gold Standard 100% Whey consists of Whey protein isolates and these are the purest form of whey. Each serving provides 24 grams of rapidly digesting whey protein. Whey Protein also contains low levels of fat, cholesterol, lactose amongst others which you can do without making Gold Standard 100% Whey the standard all other proteins are measured against.

Whey protein isolates are the primary ingredients (24gms) and 100% Whey (Unflavored) contains just 1gram of sugar and fat.

  • 5.5 grams of naturally occurring Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs).
  • Over 4 grams of glutamic acid and glutamine in each serving.
  • Whey protein isolate and ultrafiltered whey protein concentrate are used to produce Whey protein microfractions.
  • Should be used in the mornings before/after exercise or after weight training.
""

item.g:title: Tom Oliver Nutrition The Omega 3 Herring Caviar 30 Softgels
item.description:
Small, easy to swallow capsules with no fishy aftertaste
3 x more absorbable than standard fish oil
1 a day formula, high in DHA phospholipids & Choline
Tom Oliver’s Omega 3 Herring Caviar is a superior source of Omega 3 phospholipids from sustainably sourced Herring Caviar. These small, easy to swallow, 1-a-day capsules are fast absorbing, so will not leave any unpleasant aftertaste. Tom Oliver’s Herring Caviar capsules provides Marine Omega Phospholipids (MOPL) and are a rich source of EPA & DHA and help support Heart Health, Cardiovascular Function, Vision and Normal Brain Function, as well as containing naturally occurring Choline, which helps support Fat Metabolism. The Herring Caviar extract in our products is combined with fish oils from Anchovy and Sardine caught off the coast of Peru and Chile, an already well recognised source of marine omega-3 triglycerides, the omega 3 MOPL™ provides a formulation you “just can’t beat”.

DIRECTIONS FOR USE
As a food supplement for adults, take one capsule daily at mealtimes or as your health professional advises
Do not exceed recommended dose

INGREDIENTS
Herring Caviar Oil
Fish Oil (from anchovy, sardine)
Antioxidant (Tocopherol rich extract)
Choline
Capsule Shell: Gelatin, Glycerine
Caramel Colouring (natural organic)

FREE FROM
Artificial Preservatives and Colours, Corn, Wheat, Yeast, Gluten & Dairy

EACH SOFTGEL PROVIDES
Docasahexaenoic acid (DHA) 195.0mg
Eicosapentaenoic acid (EPA) 58.5mg
DHA + EPA = Minimum 253.5
Minimum 30% MOPL™ (Marine Phospholipids)
*meets the EFSA RDA for EPA & DHA*

GUIDELINES
Keep out of the reach of children
Store in a cool dry place

"

Within the body Linoleic Acid is metabolised to GLA, which is essential for the production of certain hormone-like substances called prostaglandins. Human breast milk is one of the richest natural sources of GLA, whilst LA can be found in safflower, hemp and sunflower oils.
